name: 工程機率與統計
goals: Studying discrete random variables and their probability distribution.
Studying continuous random variables and their probability distribution.
syllabus:
授課方式：16+2週

第一週: Introductions  
第二週: Set Theory  
第三週: Probability Axioms  
第四週: Conditional Probability  
第五週: Independence  
第六週: Independent Trials  
第七週: Discrete Random Variables  
第八週: 期中考  
第九週: Probability Mass Function (PMF)  
第十週: Cumulative Distribution Function (CDF)  
第十一週: Variance  
第十二週: Standard Deviation  
第十三週: Conditional PMF  
第十四週: Continuous Random Variables  
第十五週: Probability Density Function  
第十六週: 期末考  
第十七週: Gaussian Random Variables  
第十八週: Derived Random Variables
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
